qualitative.reasoning: HCL Technologies is a top-tier global IT services firm with a reputation for strong corporate governance and transparency (HCL Group/Shiv Nadar). The company maintains a pristine balance sheet with substantial negative net debt (cash rich) and a consistent track record of dividend payouts (typically >75% payout ratio). While recent growth has moderated due to global macroeconomic headwinds, the management remains focused on high-growth verticals like Engineering and R&D services.
